mapper.insert: insert into comments (bno, writer, text, cno) values (#{bno}, #{writer}, #{text}, seq_comment.nextval)
mapper.select: select bno, text, writer, commdate, commupdate, cno, thumbsup, sysdate timenow from comments where bno = #{bno} order by cno
mapper.update: update comments set text = #{text}, commupdate = sysdate where cno = #{cno}
update comments set thumbsup = thumbsup+1 where cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: select bno from(select bno, count(*) commcount from comments group by bno order by commcount desc) where rownum = 1
select text, writer from comments where to_char(commdate,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') order by commdate
select count(*) data, sysdate dateTime from comments where to_char(commdate,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') order by commdate

select t1.bno, title, commcount from(select rownum, bno, commcount from(select bno, count(*) commcount from(select * from comments where (sysdate - commdate)*24 < 1) group by bno order by commcount desc) where rownum <=3) t1 left join tbl_board t2 on (t1.bno = t2.bno)
